data.title: Burning
data.meta_description: Burning - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document provides information about the film Burning by director Lee Chang-dong, based on a short story by Haruki Murakami. It was produced by PineHousefilm, Nowfilm and NHK Film. The 148 minute film was shot in South Korea in a 2.35:1 aspect ratio and 5.1 surround sound. The document includes biographies of the director and screenwriter, synopses of the film and short story, and discussions between the director and screenwriter about adapting the mysterious story into a film about anger and mystery in today's world.
